Tom Emerson wrote:

> Igor Ranitovic writes:
> > That is pretty good! When you get a chance could you please check 
> how many queues (hosts) are part
> > of the crawl?
>
> Current status:
>
> Run time: 175h., 7 min. and 25 sec.
> Processed docs/sec: 9.57 (6.74)  KB/sc: 175 (107)
> Active Thread Count: 150 of 150
> Total data received: 64 GB
>
> Used Memory:   408172 KB
> Heap size:     520256 KB
> Max heap size: 520256 KB
>
> Frontier report: 57026 queues: 447 active (150 in-process; 96 ready;
> 201 snoozed); 54578 inactive; 0 retired
>
> Attempting to view the thread report, however, results in an
> exception. :-(

Paste it into a message Tom and send it over. 
ConcurrentModificationExceptions trying to view Frontier report are a 
known issue but you shouldn't be getting exceptions that we know of 
viewing threads reports.
St.Ack
